Package de.oth.blocklib.threading

Interface DoubleBuffer

All Known Subinterfaces:
Renderer
All Known Implementing Classes:
Console, CraftingDisplay, Crosshair, DebugOverlay, DoubleBufferedUIRenderable, GUI, IngameMenu, InventoryDisplay, InventoryDisplayChest, InventoryDisplayPlayer, InventoryHUD, InventoryManager, MasterRenderer, OpaqueMasterRenderer, RenderThread, RespawnMenu, TransparentMasterRenderer, UIBaseButton, UIBoxContainer, UIButton, UICheckBox, UICheckButton, UIChest, UIColorRect, UIConnectInterface, UIContainer, UIFrame, UIGridLayout, UIHBoxContainer, UIInventory, UIInventorySlot, UIItem, UILabel, UILineEdit, UIMarginContainer, UINotification, UIPlayerInventory, UIRenderer, UIScrollContainer, UITextBox, UITexture, UITextureButton, UITextureChunkedProgressBar, UITextureChunkedProgressBar.UITextureChunk, UITextureProgress, UIVBoxContainer, VRRenderer
public interface DoubleBuffer
The interface Double buffer. A double buffer is an object that contains two objects of the same type. It provides the method swapBuffer(). When it is called the references of the two objects will be swapped.
Author:
Loher Florian

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void swapBuffer()
    Swap the references of the two buffer objects.

  • Method Details

    • swapBuffer

      void swapBuffer()
      Swap the references of the two buffer objects.
